remarks: Transfer existential uniqueness from a variable ` x ` to another variable ` y ` contained in expression ` A ` .  Cf. ~ reuxfrd (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Apr-2017.)
statement:
reuxfr4d.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. C ) -> A e. B ) $.
reuxfr4d.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> E! y e. C x = A ) $.
reuxfr4d.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
reuxfr4d $p |- ( ph -> ( E! x e. B ps <-> E! y e. C ch ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps y $.
